title: indhukaa puTTinchithivi
sahitya:
indukA puTTincitivi nannindukA puTTincitivi



anupallavi



andakADa nannEla entO alayinci vEDuga jUcuTaku nann-



caraNam 1



A parAtpara rUpa nAdu samIpa janula cEta nApadalanu nE nE

     proddunu paritApamandi sItApati nAdupai kOpaginca nann-



caraNam 2



dAsa pOSaka sadA sadana dArAdigO sutAdula durAsacEta kAsAsa

      minci E dOsamu deliyani vEsa dharula sahavAsamu cEya nann-



caraNam 3



bhOgada Aptasulabha agadharaNa bhavarOga haraNa shrI tyAgarAjanuta

     sogasu kanulatO bAguga mIranu vEga jUDa rAdA Agamacara nann-
